The Registrar
KIET Group of Institutions
Ghaziabad Uttar Pradesh
Date: 24 May, 2024
Subject:
Urgent Request for Character Certificate i am changing

Sir,
I am a Manish Kumar Mandavi Studying in B.Tech Final Year Computer Science Branch. I have applied for the Coast Guard exam, and they need a character certificate from college.
Could you please issue My Character Certificate as soon as possible.
Your Sincerely
